notes: The MTL_UOM_CONVERSIONS table in Oracle Inventory serves as the repository for unit of measure (UOM) conversion rules. It allows the system to automatically convert between different units of measure, ensuring consistency across purchasing, inventory, order management, and manufacturing processes. It maintains conversion rates between primary and transaction UOMs, both standard and item-specific. Key columns include unit_of_measure (e.g., Square Feet), uom_code (transaction UOM like SFT), uom_class (UOM category like Area), inventory_item_id (item-specific rule), and conversion_rate (how to convert to/from the primary UOM).
